name: Avoid PLI Programs with more then 500 LoC and less then 5 Procedures (PL1)
description: This rule searches for PL1 Main Procedures (Programs) that have more 500 LoC and less than 5 procedures.
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures (Programs)  having more than 500 lines of code and less than 5 procedures.

It provides following information: 
- PL1 Main Procedures full name
rationale: Having large programs with no structured sub artifacts is difficult to maintain.
remediation: Review the PLI programs in order to not have more than 500 lines of code and less than 5 procedures.
